name: Hotel Valencia - Santana Row

reviews.text: Had not been to this property in many years, since it originally opened, and it looks like no one has taken care of the rooms since. Although Santana Row makes for a lovely setting for a business or pleasure trip to the San Jose area, this hotel lacks proper upkeep. My room actually had chewed stuck gum on a wall, assorted stray hairs around, and even trash left behind the furniture. Moreover, the walls, wood trim, and furnishings are all beat up. There is no concierge service at all, no one at the front desk had the ability to suggest hikes or even help with dinner reservations. The courtyard however is lovely, the bowl of oranges a nice touch, and the free (very standard fare) breakfast a plus. Overall, I suggest that someone focus on making the rooms clean and fresh. It feels very neglected.
reviews.title: VERY MIXED BAG: LOVELY LOCATION AND SETTING BUT OVERTIRED ROOMS AND LACK OF SERVICE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 3 nights in early June, 2013, and it's really a shame that management finds it necessary to be so ridiculously petty in its fine print, as this creates a negative vibe, when the hotel itself is terrific and the front desk and other staff are so nice. You aren't allowed to bring "outside alcohol" into your room. Are we in high school? Is management big brother? My husband and I (empty-nesting, frequent travelers) cannot have a glass of our own wine while we watch the news at night in our room? Really? Also, please note that they add 19% to the $7 bottle of water, and anything else you eat from the snack tray in your room, and if you happen to prefer to not be tempted by it during your stay, they charge $25 to remove it from your room. Do they happen to be sympathetic at all to guests with allergies to Snickers and peanut M&M's, or guests who struggle with weight issues? Bed was comfy, room was quiet, complimentary breakfast was very nice, and while they define it as "continental," it included hot eggs, a meat, potatoes the days we stayed, in addition to traditional continental fare. Staff was wonderful. Santana Row was great fun. Eat at Lark Creek Blue and The Left Bank.
reviews.title: Why all the negative fine print?

reviews.text: I recently stayed at the Hotel Valencia on Business for the second time. It has beautiful rooms, a lovely atmosphere, and a great location with easy access to restaurants, shopping, and nightlife. The rooms include free wifi rate-limited to 1.5 mbps or you can pay $10 a night for 5 mbps, both are limited to 5 devices per room. I'd never seen tiered internet in a hotel before and while 1.5 mbps is painfully slow I did reliably get that speed—unlike in many hotels with internet that is unresponsive and prone to connection loss.

I frequently stay at Hotel Valencia Santana Row when traveling to San Jose for business. The rooms are nicely furnished and set up for business travelers (desk, wireless internet, plenty of outlets.) Internet and a very nice breakfast are included in the room rate. There is a small but adequate fitness center. Parking is easy and free if you self park - a recent upgrade is the ability to print out your parking pass before you arrive. I like being in Santana Row with plenty of restaurants and shopping within walking distance - including Valley Fair Mall. For me, the only downside of this hotel is that it is a very popular night spot and it can be noisy late at night.
reviews.title: Nice but noisy

description: Hotel Valencia Santana Row is the only hotel located on Santana Row! Our boutique hotel in San Jose, CA is at the center of all the excitement, entertainment, shopping and dining on Santana Row and near the Silicon Valley and Cupertino. Hotel Valencia is ideal for a romantic or weekend getaway, a business trip or corporate group or convention. See and be seen at our hip and swanky Vbar or dine in the acclaimed Citrus Restaurant with menus by Executive Chef Robert Sapirman. Hotel Valencia Santana Row invites guest to experience luxury with our 212 rooms and suites and experience exceptional service and surroundings during your stay.
